text: N’abahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri bazojanwa mumuriro udahera witiriwe Jahannamu bari imirwi n’iyindi kugeza naho bazoyishikira yugururwe imiryango yayo n’abacungereye uwo muriro bazobwirwa bati:- mbega ntimwashikiwe n’intumwa z’Imana ziri muri mwebwe ziba somera amajambo y’Umuremyi wanyu nukuba tuza kw’ihuriro ry’uwo musi wanyu, nabone bazovuga bati:- nukubera iki? mugabo ryaremejwe ijambo ry’ibihano rizoba kuri bamwe bahakanye Imana yabo y’ukuri
